page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: Branston is a big village and it is about 5 miles away from Lincoln and most people work and go shopping in Lincoln.I wanted to see how many people have a car and use public transport or need public transport to get into Lincoln.Out of the 26 people in Branston I interveued 19 people had a car 13 people had a bike and 2 people had a motor bike.Most people went into Lincoln shopping and for dental appointments and even business.Some people walk to Lincoln every day to get fit!12 people use the bus service no more than occasionally.2 people use it once a week.No one uses it regularly and 6 people never use it.People do use public transport but it is not that important because most people in Branston have a car.
